tasks.label: R CMD check growthVB (quick)
tasks.command: Rscript -e "setwd('growthVB'); if (!requireNamespace('roxygen2', quietly = TRUE)) install.packages('roxygen2', repos='https://cloud.r-project.org'); roxygen2::roxygenize(); if (!requireNamespace('devtools', quietly = TRUE)) install.packages('devtools', repos='https://cloud.r-project.org'); devtools::check(args = c('--no-manual'), document = FALSE)"
